languages.text: {n}Израненный монстр издает вопль, резонирующий от мощи Губительных сил, и отступает. Его броня покрыта пробоинами, вокс-динамики захлебываются молитвами, в которых сплетаются отчаяние и счастье:{/n} "Не страшусь кощунства заблуждающихся, ибо обещано мне. Проницаю взором пламенным сердца сомневающихся, ибо даровано мне. Искореняю ложную веру, ибо стою на пути истинном. И не оставлен буду защитой Истинных Богов!"

{n}The wounded monster lets out a scream that resonates with the might of the Ruinous Powers, and retreats. Its armour is riddled with holes, and its vox-speakers are clogged with tangled prayers of despair and joy:{/n} "I fear not the blasphemy of the deluded, for it is promised to me. With my eye of flame I pierce the hearts of the doubting, for it is granted to me. I root out false faith, for I stand on the true path. And I will not be forsaken by the protection of the True Gods!"
languages.original_text: {n}Израненный монстр издает вопль, резонирующий от мощи Губительных сил, и отступает. Его броня покрыта пробоинами, вокс-динамики захлебываются молитвами, в которых сплетаются отчаяние и счастье:{/n} "Не страшусь кощунства заблуждающихся, ибо обещано мне. Проницаю взором пламенным сердца сомневающихся, ибо даровано мне. Искореняю ложную веру, ибо стою на пути истинном. И не оставлен буду защитой Истинных Богов!"

languages.text: {n}受了伤的怪物发出一声尖叫，与毁灭之力产生了共鸣，随即向后退去。它的护甲已经千疮百孔，音阵装置传来了充满绝望与喜悦的祈祷。{/n}“我从不畏惧妄想之人的亵渎，因为这是真神对我的承诺。我的烈焰之眼将刺穿怀疑之人的心灵，因为这是真神应许我的权柄。我将根除虚假的信仰，因为我站在真正的道路上！真神的守护绝不会离我而去！”
languages.original_text: {n}The wounded monster lets out a scream that resonates with the might of the Ruinous Powers, and retreats. Its armour is riddled with holes, and its vox-speakers are clogged with tangled prayers of despair and joy:{/n} "I fear not the blasphemy of the deluded, for it is promised to me. With my eye of flame I pierce the hearts of the doubting, for it is granted to me. I root out false faith, for I stand on the true path. And I will not be forsaken by the protection of the True Gods!"

traits.locale_text: {n}受了伤的怪物发出一声尖叫，与毁灭之力产生了共鸣，随即向后退去。它的护甲已经千疮百孔，音阵装置传来了充满绝望与喜悦的祈祷。{/n}“我从不畏惧妄想之人的亵渎，因为这是真神对我的承诺。我的烈焰之眼将刺穿怀疑之人的心灵，因为这是真神应许我的权柄。我将根除虚假的信仰，因为我站在真正的道路上！真神的守护绝不会离我而去！”

languages.text: {n}手負いの怪物は〈禍つ神々〉の力と共鳴する叫び声をあげて逃げ出す。アーマーは穴だらけで、ヴォクス・スピーカーは絶望と歓喜が絡み合った祈りの文言でいっぱいだ。{/n}「裏切り者が冒涜的な行いをしたところで俺は恐れぬ、それが誓いだからだ。俺はこの炎の瞳で疑惑の心を見抜く、そのために与えられたのだから。俺は誤った信仰を根絶やしにする、真実の道に立っているのだから。そうだ、俺が真の神の加護から見放されることはない！」
languages.original_text: {n}The wounded monster lets out a scream that resonates with the might of the Ruinous Powers, and retreats. Its armour is riddled with holes, and its vox-speakers are clogged with tangled prayers of despair and joy:{/n} "I fear not the blasphemy of the deluded, for it is promised to me. With my eye of flame I pierce the hearts of the doubting, for it is granted to me. I root out false faith, for I stand on the true path. And I will not be forsaken by the protection of the True Gods!"

traits.locale_text: {n}手負いの怪物は〈禍つ神々〉の力と共鳴する叫び声をあげて逃げ出す。アーマーは穴だらけで、ヴォクス・スピーカーは絶望と歓喜が絡み合った祈りの文言でいっぱいだ。{/n}「裏切り者が冒涜的な行いをしたところで俺は恐れぬ、それが誓いだからだ。俺はこの炎の瞳で疑惑の心を見抜く、そのために与えられたのだから。俺は誤った信仰を根絶やしにする、真実の道に立っているのだから。そうだ、俺が真の神の加護から見放されることはない！」

languages.text: {n}El monstruo herido lanza un bramido que resuena con la fuerza de los Poderes Ruinosos y retrocede. Su armadura está plagada de agujeros y los altavoces de su voco repiten oraciones enmarañadas de desesperación y júbilo:{/n} «No temo la blasfemia de los ilusos, pues me ha sido prometida. Con mi ojo de fuego atravieso los corazones de los dudosos, pues me ha sido concedido. Desarraigo la falsa fe, pues sigo la senda correcta. ¡Los Dioses Verdaderos no me apartarán de su manto!».
languages.original_text: {n}The wounded monster lets out a scream that resonates with the might of the Ruinous Powers, and retreats. Its armour is riddled with holes, and its vox-speakers are clogged with tangled prayers of despair and joy:{/n} "I fear not the blasphemy of the deluded, for it is promised to me. With my eye of flame I pierce the hearts of the doubting, for it is granted to me. I root out false faith, for I stand on the true path. And I will not be forsaken by the protection of the True Gods!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El monstruo herido lanza un bramido que resuena con la fuerza de los Poderes Ruinosos y retrocede. Su armadura está plagada de agujeros y los altavoces de su voco repiten oraciones enmarañadas de desesperación y júbilo:{/n} «No temo la blasfemia de los ilusos, pues me ha sido prometida. Con mi ojo de fuego atravieso los corazones de los dudosos, pues me ha sido concedido. Desarraigo la falsa fe, pues sigo la senda correcta. ¡Los Dioses Verdaderos no me apartarán de su manto!».

languages.text: {n}Le monstre blessé pousse un cri empreint de la force des Puissances de la Ruine et recule. Son armure est criblée de trous et ses synthétiseurs-vox vomissent un salmigondis de prières de désespoir et de joie :{/n} « Je ne crains pas le blasphème des fourvoyés, car il m'a été promis. De mon œil de feu je perce le cœur des douteurs, car tel est mon privilège. J'éradique la fausse foi, car je marche sur la voie de la vérité. Et les vrais dieux ne me priveront pas de leur protection ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The wounded monster lets out a scream that resonates with the might of the Ruinous Powers, and retreats. Its armour is riddled with holes, and its vox-speakers are clogged with tangled prayers of despair and joy:{/n} "I fear not the blasphemy of the deluded, for it is promised to me. With my eye of flame I pierce the hearts of the doubting, for it is granted to me. I root out false faith, for I stand on the true path. And I will not be forsaken by the protection of the True Gods!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le monstre blessé pousse un cri empreint de la force des Puissances de la Ruine et recule. Son armure est criblée de trous et ses haut-parleurs vomissent un salmigondis de prières de désespoir et de joie :{/n} « Je ne crains pas le blasphème des fourvoyés, car il m'a été promis. De mon œil de feu je perce le cœur des douteurs, car tel est mon privilège. J'éradique la fausse foi, car je marche sur la voie de la vérité. Et les vrais dieux ne me priveront pas de leur protection ! »

languages.text: {n}Das verwundete Monster schreit im Einklang mit den Mächten der Zerstörung und zieht sich zurück. Seine Panzerung ist voller Löcher, und aus seinen Vox-Lautsprechern ertönen Gebete der Verzweiflung und Freude:{/n} "Ich fürchte nicht die Blasphemie der Verwirrten, denn sie ist mir versprochen. Mit meinem Flammenauge durchbohre ich die Herzen der Zweifelnden, denn sie wurden mir zugesagt. Ich vernichte falschen Glauben, denn ich stehe auf dem wahren Weg. Und der Schutz der wahren Götter wird mich nie im Stich lassen!"
languages.original_text: {n}The wounded monster lets out a scream that resonates with the might of the Ruinous Powers, and retreats. Its armour is riddled with holes, and its vox-speakers are clogged with tangled prayers of despair and joy:{/n} "I fear not the blasphemy of the deluded, for it is promised to me. With my eye of flame I pierce the hearts of the doubting, for it is granted to me. I root out false faith, for I stand on the true path. And I will not be forsaken by the protection of the True Gods!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Das verwundete Monster schreit im Einklang mit den Mächten der Zerstörung und zieht sich zurück. Mit meinem Flammenauge durchbohre ich die Herzen der Zweifelnden, denn sie wurden mir zugesagt. Ich vernichte falschen Glauben, denn ich stehe auf dem wahren Weg. Und der Schutz der wahren Götter wird mich nie im Stich lassen!"

languages.text: {n}Yaralı canavar, Yıkıcı Güçler'in kuvvetine yaraşır bir çığlık atıp geri çekiliyor. Zırhı delik deşik olmuş, voks hoparlörü de iç içe geçmiş umutsuzluk ve neşeyle tonlarıyla tıkanmış.{/n} "Kandırılmışın dine aykırılığından korkmam, zira o bana vadedilmiştir. Alev gözümle şüphe edenlerin yüreklerini delerim, zira o bana vadedilmiştir. Hatalı inançların kökünü kazırım, zira doğru yolda yürürüm. Gerçek Tanrıların koruması, beni asla terk etmeyecek!"
languages.original_text: {n}The wounded monster lets out a scream that resonates with the might of the Ruinous Powers, and retreats. Its armour is riddled with holes, and its vox-speakers are clogged with tangled prayers of despair and joy:{/n} "I fear not the blasphemy of the deluded, for it is promised to me. With my eye of flame I pierce the hearts of the doubting, for it is granted to me. I root out false faith, for I stand on the true path. And I will not be forsaken by the protection of the True Gods!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yaralı canavar, Yıkıcı Güçlerin kuvvetine yaraşır bir çığlık atıp geri çekiliyor. Zırhı delik deşik olmuş ve voks hoparlörü iç içe geçmiş umutsuzluk ve neşeyle tıkanmış hâlde:{/n} "Kandırılmışın günahından korkmam, zira o bana vaadedilmiştir. Alev gözümle şüphe edenlerin yüreklerini delerim, zira o bana vaadedilmiştir. Hatalı inançların kökünü kazırım, zira doğru yolda yürürüm. Gerçek Tanrıların koruması, beni asla terk etmeyecek!"
